name: Bigger Than I Thought
description:
BUG Fall Jam

We made this game with the theme "It's bigger on the inside" in the 48 hours given to us.

*Controls*
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Shift - Sprint

*Story*
Player is and adventurer and he is trying to solve a mystery on the island.

*Objective*
Finding Relics and activating Pillars to solve the mystery of island.




Emre Ozan  -  Designer
İbrahim Can Biricik  -  Developer
